meaningMnemonic: Things will be <kanji>bright</kanji> <kanji>after</kanji> the next <kanji>day</kanji>. Or you can think of it as adding an 後 in between your 明日. And what comes after tomorrow? It's the <vocabulary>day after tomorrow</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
Unfortunately, the reading for this is a complete exception, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

"What do you want to eat the <vocabulary>day after tomorrow</vocabulary>?", your mom asks you. You answer, "<reading>Ah, satay</reading> (あさって)?" You're not so confident because you never know what you want to eat the day after tomorrow, but you absolutely love satay, the Indonesian skewers. Ah, satay it is!
